statements.select: /* ProfileDac.SelectJsUser */ SELECT emp_pwd AS "Password" ,'AC007005' AS "EmplCode" FROM gEmp10T WHERE emp_id = #UserId#
/* ProfileDac.SelectUser */ SELECT mempwd AS "Password" , 'AC007001' AS "UserSeCode" , grade_name AS "UserSeName" , 'N' AS "PassChangeElapseAt" , email AS "Email" FROM gMemb10T WHERE memid = #UserId#

/* ProfileDac.SelectJsUserAuthGroupList 사용자 권한그룹 목록 조회*/ SELECT A.AUTHOR_GROUP_CODE FROM TN_AUTHOR_GROUP_EMPLYR A, TN_AUTHOR_GROUP B WHERE B.AUTHOR_GROUP_CODE = B.AUTHOR_GROUP_CODE AND A.EMPL_CODE = #emplCode# AND B.USE_AT = 'Y'
/* ProfileDac.OldSelectJsUser */ SELECT PASSWORD AS "Password" ,EMPL_CODE AS "EmplCode" FROM TN_EMPL WHERE USER_ID = #UserId# AND USE_AT = 'Y'

/* ProfileDac.SelectKtcUserMenuAuthList */ SELECT ALWNC_AUTHOR_CODE FROM TN_EMPL LEFT JOIN TN_AUTHOR_GROUP_EMPLYR ON TN_EMPL.EMPL_CODE = TN_AUTHOR_GROUP_EMPLYR.EMPL_CODE LEFT JOIN TN_AUTHOR_GROUP ON TN_AUTHOR_GROUP_EMPLYR.AUTHOR_GROUP_CODE = TN_AUTHOR_GROUP.AUTHOR_GROUP_CODE AND TN_AUTHOR_GROUP.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TN_AUTHOR_GROUP_MENU ON TN_AUTHOR_GROUP.AUTHOR_GROUP_CODE = TN_AUTHOR_GROUP_MENU.AUTHOR_GROUP_CODE AND MENU_CODE = #MenuCode# WHERE TN_EMPL.USER_ID = #UserId# AND TN_EMPL.USE_AT = 'Y' AND TN_AUTHOR_GROUP.USE_AT = 'Y'

/* ProfileDac.SelectKtcUserMenuAuthList KTC사용자 권한그룹 목록 조회*/ SELECT A.AUTHOR_GROUP_CODE FROM TN_AUTHOR_GROUP_EMPLYR A, TN_AUTHOR_GROUP B WHERE B.AUTHOR_GROUP_CODE = B.AUTHOR_GROUP_CODE AND A.EMPL_CODE = #emplCode# AND B.USE_AT = 'Y'
